item.description:
About me Link to heading

Freelance software engineer with over 10 years of professional experience.

My expertise is in the design and development of data-intensive applications that use Machine Learning or NLP to solve problems in various domains.

Based in FÃ¼rth, Germany, and working remotely for the past few years.

Main Skills Link to heading

  • Design and implementation of data-intensive, scalable software systems
  • Project management and technical lead
  • Machine Learning - Classification, NLP, Recommender Systems, Keras, pyTorch
  • Backend Java, Kotlin, Spring Boot, Python, Flask, FastAPI, Kafka, MongoDB, PostgreSQL
  • DevOps - CI, Kubernetes, Docker, Cloud services (e.g. AWS)
  • Frontend - JavaScript, TypeScript, React, Redux, material-ui

Selected Projects Link to heading

Prediction of product characteristics in the OTTO eCommerce shop Link to heading

Role: Machine Learning Engineer
Technology: Python pyTorch Keras Java Spring Boot JPA Kafka KStream AWS PostgreSQL
Duration: 01.2022 - 06.2023

I build and evaluated machine learning models to predict product characteristics. One of my notable achievements includes developing a multi-output neural network that was successfully deployed in production, enriching millions of products. In addition, I extended and created several streaming services (stateful and stateless) and contributed to their functionality and scalability, allowing millions of products and predictions to be processed efficiently.
